review:
She is the most patient medical practitioner I have ever met. Your troubles feel less burdensome after having to talk to her. Her key feature is her friendliness and her patience to listen.
Would definitely recommend her to every one.

review: She is very friendly,she explained and treat well.she gave me the medicines for infertility,after 1 month consulation,i am pregnant.

I am glad to write this feedback about the services provided by the motherhood hospital with regards to

Dr. Kathyayini and her support staff.
Dr. Kathyayini was too good to make me feel very comfortable whenever was on a visit to her also could get assistance from her over the phone with regards to any queries irrespective of the time.
Coming to support staff they were also friendly & supportive in all the queries addressed to them and took good care  whenever I visited the hospital for a checkup. Not to mention Noor was also very helpful in all stages from the start to end of my journey under Dr. Kathyayini and was quite responsive whenever we had any queries.
Overall the experience and the services from the Doctor and staff of the motherhood Hospital were very good.

We have been trying to conceive for the past 4 years and we have consulted n number of doctors but only Dr Kathiyani understood and correctly diagnosed our problem, She is a great doctor and most importantly she is a kind human being, very friendly, explained everything to the details during our procedures. We are lucky that we met Dr Kathiyani, she responds to our calls and msgs 24x7. On this platform we want to thank her,
Thank you Mam for everything!!
